column4: Does anyone know if you can make it so when you use the volume control on your keyboard, the little box that shows where the volume is at doesn't come up?
mine works out of the box ;)
Maybe your wireless, but if you have a gfx card you had to install a driver =P
My wireless card is REALLY old... so I guess they never put drivers in the kernal for it...
true but its part of my setup script, rips out about a gig of guff, installs java, flash and install nvidia driver then adds network config files and dns settings. Good times
That's more complicated than netlarip is planning on getting into ;)
Any reason not to just use the plugin from the repositories?
no idea, thats what is needed though
i have a script i found online that installs native 64bit java :)
i do, i have nearly 1gb of scripts
there is the webupd8 ppa which has a newer version
